item.title: Using GitHub Codespaces for Hugo development
item.description: In this blog post, I try using Github Codespaces to write this blog post about using Codespaces to write blog posts in Hugo! Yes, it’s meta ðŸ¤“ A GitHub Codespace is a cloud based developer environment attached to your GitHub repository. It contains the necessary dependencies to be able to work on your codebase in VS Code (in-browser or you can connect from your desktop!) and then commit your code. Having a Codespace means never having to get all those pesky project dependencies set up on your computer AND it means you’re always working from a clean environment so “Works on my machine” should be a thing of the past!
